content: these foldable animal market bags are a 10-in-1 pattern bee turtle pig bear owl panda bear cat ladybug frog cow and were designed for a live quick cal you can join the **free cal starting july 30 - aug 3 2025 for 3 days** releasing 1 pattern part per day the pattern will include 3 live video tutorials for each section of the pattern and extra support > the free cal s pattern includes ads live video tutorials will be at 12pm pt on youtube 1 for part 1 first circle & main bag body - july 30th 2025 part 2 second circle and connection to the first circle - aug 1st 2025 part 3 some of the animal parts - aug 3rd 2025 > and the only way to get the > pattern **ad-free and printer-friendly** > is in the **pdf** the **pdf > is cheaper on my website ** > so you can get the pdf here for $13 > or on my website for $10 > the pdf allows you to work at your > own pace as the entire pattern is > included in the pdf >**get the pdf here 2 ** > but you can also purchase the ad-free > printer-friendly pdf here on ravelry > this cal pattern will also be released in my > crochet membership in parts which includes over > 500 patterns and 100s of video > tutorials you can join the membership here 3 1 https //www youtube com/nickishomemadecrafts/live 2 https //nickinhc--nickishomemadecrafts thrivecart com/animal-foldable-market-bag-pdf/ ref=raverly 3 https //www nickishomemadecrafts com/crochet/the-crochet-club/
